description:
Gain immediate access to special Agent Gear outfits for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond, exclusive to SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories.

Includes:
- Agent Suit for Loid, Anya, and Yor
- Agent Hat for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond
- Agent Sunglasses for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond
- Necktie collar for Bond

*Any purchase of the game made by July 26, 2024 is eligible to receive the above bonus content.
*Content and features are subject to change without notice.
*This bonus allows immediate access to the above outfits and accessories, which can also be unlocked by playing the game.
*Bonus content consists of in-game items.
For further details about the bonus content, please visit the official website.
*Custom outfits will not be displayed during certain minigames and cutscenes.
name: SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories - Early Bird Purchase Bonus
